title: Plan weekend hiking trip
description:

*Check weather forecast before deciding on trail*

title: Set up automatic savings transfer
description:
### Automatic Savings Setup

**Transfer details:**
- Amount: $500 monthly
- Source: Checking account
- Destination: High-yield savings
- Schedule: 1st of each month

**Next steps:**
1. Log into online banking
2. Navigate to transfers section
3. Set up recurring transfer
4. Confirm first transfer date

*Goal: Build emergency fund to 6 months expenses*
